title: The Voice of the Turtle: A Comedy in Three Acts
description: John van Druten's 3-character play ran for years on Broadway during WW2. It centers on the unexpected weekend of a soldier on leave in NYC and the romantic young actress who shows him the town. "A delightful comedy..it sparkles with wit and has a quality of great tenderness" --  The New York Times.
author: John van Druten
